give_and_take.name: Give and Take
give_and_take.desc:
Deal less damage to comrades and receive less damage from comrades.
[*Note: 20% less damage to and from allies.]

off_your_game.name: Off Your Game
off_your_game.desc: You now slow Taunted enemies when you hit them.

cornered_fool.name: Cornered Fool
cornered_fool.desc:
Blockbreaking a Charmed opponent procs Taunt for a scaled duration, making them take and deal more damage. 15s CD.
[*Note: 3 seconds at 0 Charisma, 6 seconds at 85 Charisma.]
